title: Google Trends Scraper
description: Extract Google Trends data including interest over time, geographic interest, related topics, and related queries.

searchTerms.title: Search terms
searchTerms.description: List of search terms to scrape from Google Trends. Each term will be processed separately.

startUrls.title: Google Trends URLs
startUrls.description: Direct Google Trends explore URLs with pre-applied filters. If provided, parameters from URLs take precedence.

geo.title: Geographic region
geo.description: Two-letter country code (e.g., US, GB, DE) or leave empty for worldwide data.

timeRange.title: Time range
timeRange.description: Predefined time range for the search.

customTimeRange.title: Custom time range
customTimeRange.description: Custom date range in format 'YYYY-MM-DD YYYY-MM-DD'. Takes precedence over timeRange if provided.

category.title: Category
category.description: Google Trends category ID. Use 0 for all categories.

isMultiple.title: Multiple terms (comma-separated)
isMultiple.description: If checked, commas in search terms will be treated as multiple separate terms.

maxItems.title: Max items
maxItems.description: Maximum number of search terms to process. 0 means no limit.

maxRequestRetries.title: Max request retries
maxRequestRetries.description: Number of retry attempts for failed requests.
